sentences: Mike Fantastic is a British electropop artist formed in 2010.
Mike Fantastic was initially made notable by their début on Britain's Got Talent in May 2010, and have since released an album and two singles.
In November 2011, the band ended for a short period due to management issues, returning in February 2012 with Owen being the only remaining member.
Owen Sheppard - lead vocals, production, programming, percussion, song writing (2010–2011, 2012–present)Former members
